DOC.brief_summary: A single center , randomize , parallel , clinical outcome trial compare rate heal chronic wound debrided either high energy ultrasonic debridement ( cavitation ) standard care sharp debridement .
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasonic Wound Debridement vs. Standard Sharp Debridement
DOC.criteria: Chronic wound need debridement > 3 cm2 Ulcer history > 4mo Adequate arterial blood flow ( ABI > 0.7 ) Venous , Inflammatory , Pressure , Diabetic Bleeding disorder ABI < 0.7 Uncontrolled diabetes Taking systemic corticosteroid Chemotherapy Participating another study Treatment Apligraft , Dermagraft , Regranex within 90 day
